Title: Abhorrant Ghoul King
Legend: On foot, the Abhorrant Ghoul King fights among his infantry. With his necromantic magic, the king imbues his followers with even greater fury, urging them into battle even as he rends apart foes with dripping claws and razor fangs.
Intro: BATTALIONSThis warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Royal Family • Mortevell’s Helcourt

Rules.Rule: DESCRIPTIONAn Abhorrant Ghoul King is a single model armed with Gory Talons and Fangs.

Rules.Name: Royal Blood
Rules.Fluff: The vampiric blood that courses through a Ghoul King’s veins can heal even the most terrible wounds.
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES In your hero phase, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model.

Rules.Name: Black Hunger
Rules.Rule: MAGICThis model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast one spell in your hero phase, and attempt to unbind one spell in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Black Hunger spells.

Rules.Name: Black Hunger
Rules.Fluff: The Ghoul King invokes a terrifying frenzy in his deranged minions.
Rules.Rule: Black Hunger has a casting value of 5. If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly FLESH-EATER COURTS unit wholly within 24" of the caster and visible to them. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by that unit until your next hero phase.

Rules.Name: Summon Men-At-Arms
Rules.Fluff: With a curt command, the Ghoul King calls forth his finest men-at-arms.
Rules.Rule: COMMAND ABILITIESSummon Men-at-arms: You can use this command ability at the end of your movement phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly model that has this command ability and has not used it before in the battle. That model summons 1 unit of up to 10 CRYPT GHOULS to the battlefield. The summoned unit is added to your army, and must be set up wholly within 6" of the edge of the battlefield and more than 9" from any enemy units.
